## Installation

```{r eval=FALSE}
devtools::install_github("ropensci/ritis")
```

```{r}
library("ritis")
```

## Solr service

matches only monomials

```{r}
itis_search(q = "nameWOInd:/[A-Za-z0-9]*[%20]{0,0}*/")
```

matches only binomials

```{r}
itis_search(q = "nameWOInd:/[A-Za-z0-9]*[%20]{1,1}[A-Za-z0-9]*/")
```
